title: General Knowledge Quiz
description: Test your knowledge on various topics

questions.text: What is the capital of Japan?
questions.explanation: Tokyo is the capital city of Japan.

questions.text: Which planet is known as the Red Planet?
questions.explanation: Mars is often called the Red Planet due to its reddish appearance.

questions.text: Who wrote the play Romeo and Juliet?
questions.explanation: Romeo and Juliet was written by William Shakespeare around 1595.
